function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pre- and post-pandemic mobility behavior analysis may lead to ineffective solutions if not updated with the latest data and trends","Impact":"Ineffective policies and solutions could lead to increased risk of disease spread and reduced public health quality","Mitigation":"Regular updates and analysis of the latest mobility behavior data to inform policy decisions","Technologies":"Advanced analytics tools and machine learning algorithms for real-time data analysis","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk-taking attitudes affecting human mobility and social confinement may lead to increased disease spread","Impact":"Risky behaviors could lead to higher disease transmission and reduced effectiveness of public health measures","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, targeted interventions for high-risk groups, and enforcement of public health guidelines","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking apps, social media monitoring tools, and data analytics for risk assessment","People":"General public, high-risk individuals, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Reliance on smartphone user data for epidemic tracking may pose privacy and data security risks","Impact":"Data breaches and privacy violations could erode public trust and lead to misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Data anonymization, strict data access controls, and transparent data usage policies","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure data storage, encryption tools, and GDPR-compliant data governance","People":"Smartphone users, public health decision-makers, data analysts","Owner":"Government agencies, technology companies, public health organizations"}]}
